title.rendered: Aberdeen University Scholarship For Masters Degree, Application Process

content.rendered:
Aberdeen University Scholarship and Admission Process

This is to inform all future and present students that, The Aberdeen Global Scholarship is out for the 2024 academic session this is for the interested candidate who wants to grab the opportunity to apply.

Aberdeen University Scholarship and Application Process. Aberdeen Scholarship  is open for all  Master’s degree

Courses offered at the University

The Fractional Funding rate is £3,000.

Aberdeen Global Scholarship 2024 is offered for a Master’s degree in the field of Courses offered

at the University. You can also apply for the scholarship here. The application deadline for sending your application is Always Open.

This scholarship is provided by the University of Aberdeen and the value of this scholarship is Partial Funding, £3,000. This scholarship is open for all nationalities:

Please kindly take note of the below information.

Degree: Masters

Provided by: University of Aberdeen

Deadline: Always Open

Scholarship value: Partial Funding, £3,000

Note: that the objective of The Aberdeen Global Scholarship purpose is to support and encourage all students worldwide to be enrolled in the university.

The eligibility for The Aberdeen Global Scholarship  is as follows:

  • The Aberdeen Global Scholarship 2024 is open to all nationalities.
  • All the program-specific requirements must be met.
  • The applicant must have firmly accepted an unconditional offer from the University.
  • No application is required for this scholarship.
  • Value of The Aberdeen Global Scholarship 2024:
  • The successful applicants of The Aberdeen Global Scholarship 2024 will receive an

amount of £3,000.

  • The deadline for The Aberdeen Global Scholarship 2024 is none:
  • The applications for Aberdeen Global Scholarship 2024 are always open.

For more information, you can https://www.abdn.ac.uk/study/postgraduate-taught/apply.php
